component.name: GulpGulpGulpDot Engine
component.summary: Multi-platform 2D and 3D game engine with a feature-rich editor

description.p: Gulpgulpgulpdot is an advanced, feature-packed, multi-platform 2D and 3D game engine. It provides a huge set of common tools, so you can just focus on making your game without reinventing the wheel.
Gulpgulpgulpdot is completely free and open source under the very permissive MIT license. No strings attached, no royalties, nothing. Your game is yours, down to the last line of engine code.
